abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether or not the session wants to connect to new peers.
overview:
## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/isAvailable] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the session is visible to other peers based on its [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/sessionMode] property. When [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/isAvailable] is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], it remains connected to peers, but is no longer visible to nonconnected peers. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

Typically, your application configures the session object with a delegate and data receiver, and then sets [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/isAvailable] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. When the delegate finishes connecting to peers, it should set the session’s [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/isAvailable] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

# isAvailable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether or not the session wants to connect to new peers.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAvailable: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/isAvailable] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the session is visible to other peers based on its [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/sessionMode] property. When [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/isAvailable] is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], it remains connected to peers, but is no longer visible to nonconnected peers. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

Typically, your application configures the session object with a delegate and data receiver, and then sets [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/isAvailable] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. When the delegate finishes connecting to peers, it should set the session’s [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/isAvailable] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: isAvailable
